pages.text: The Oak and Spruce seeds are in a long term preservation state but can be awakened by combining them with some water.

Now that we've got the life, lets cultivate it on dirt! $(br)Note that the extreme rain will destroy these! $(br)It is also worth noting that these trees don't grow without $(l)skylight$(), even with bonemeal! $(br)(The same rules apply to crops!)
You may be wondering how to get the dirt: just till coarse dirt with a hoe to get some!
Now that you have grown trees, you can unlock their unique attributes and utilize them to their full potential!

pages.title: Oak Tree Uses
pages.text: Apples are commonly dropped from oak trees and are a good source of food.

pages.title: Spruce Tree Uses
pages.text: Spruce Logs can be processed into Spruce Sap!
